set_sink.doc: set this speaker as the default audio output device
set_sink.confirmation: set your speaker to be the default audio output

play_music.doc: play music on this device; the result is platform dependent (eg might open the default music player app)
play_music.confirmation: play some music on your speaker

raise_volume.doc: increase the audio volume on this speaker (by some platform specific amount)
raise_volume.confirmation: increase the volume on your speaker

lower_volume.doc: increase the audio volume on this speaker (by some platform specific amount)
lower_volume.confirmation: decrease the volume on your speaker

args.name: percent
args.question: What volume do you want to set (in percent)?

set_volume.doc: set the volume on this device to the given percent value
set_volume.confirmation: set the volume on your speaker to $percent %
